tool.name: OGS: addDataToRaster
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'addDataToRaster'.
tool.command: addDataToRaster --output_raster '$output_raster' #if str($scaling_value): --scaling_value '$scaling_value' #end if #if str($offset_value): --offset_value '$offset_value' #end if #if str($ll_x): --ll_x '$ll_x' #end if #if str($ll_y): --ll_y '$ll_y' #end if #if str($ur_x): --ur_x '$ur_x' #end if #if str($ur_y): --ur_y '$ur_y' #end if --function '$function' --input '$input'

param.name: output_raster
param.label: output raster
param.help: the output raster is stored to a file of this name

param.name: scaling_value
param.label: scaling value
param.help: value the function sin(x pi) sin(y pi) will be scaled with

param.name: offset_value
param.label: offset value
param.help: constant added to the function 'scaling * sin(x pi) * sin(y pi)'

param.name: ll_x
param.label: ll x
param.help: x coordinate of lower left point of axis aligned rectangular region

param.name: ll_y
param.label: ll y
param.help: y coordinate of lower left point of axis aligned rectangular region

param.name: ur_x
param.label: ur x
param.help: x coordinate of the upper right point of axis aligned rectangular region

param.name: ur_y
param.label: ur y
param.help: y coordinate of the upper right point of axis aligned rectangular region

param.name: function
param.label: function
param.help: the function used to modify the raster

tool.help: This tool runs the **addDataToRaster** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
